entry.def: If you unbutton an item of clothing, you undo the buttons fastening it.

example.ex: She had begun to unbutton her blouse.

example.tran: 他没有扣上纽扣的蓝色外套

sentences.sentence: "the wind picked up the hem of her unbuttoned coat"

means.word_mean: 2. not under constraint in action or expression;
